title: [e_commerce] Low Conversion Rate
description: The average conversion rate across web sessions is only 9%, indicating a significant opportunity for improvement in converting visitors into customers.
recommendations: Analyze user behavior to identify drop-off points
business_impact: Improving conversion rates can lead to increased sales and revenue.

title: [e_commerce] High Discount Rates on Orders
description: The average discount rate of 7% and a maximum of 20% could indicate aggressive pricing strategies that may erode profit margins.
recommendations: Review pricing strategies to ensure sustainability
Implement loyalty programs to reduce reliance on discounts
business_impact: Sustainable pricing strategies can enhance profitability and brand value.

business_impact: Revenue impact from 29 items (5.8%)

title: [e_commerce] High Customer Lifetime Value Variability
description: The customer lifetime value ranges significantly from 0 to 608,775, suggesting a disparity in customer engagement and retention strategies.
recommendations: Segment customers for targeted retention strategies
Identify high-value customers and tailor services to them
business_impact: Addressing this variability can enhance customer loyalty and profitability.

title: [e_commerce] Dependence on Online Acquisition Channel
description: The majority of customers (48 out of 200) are acquired through online channels, indicating a potential over-reliance on this method.
recommendations: Diversify acquisition channels to include more offline strategies
business_impact: Reducing reliance on a single channel can mitigate risks associated with market changes.

title: [e_commerce] Product Stock Levels and Margin Concerns
description: With an average stock quantity of 227.34 and a margin rate of 35%, there may be issues with stock management and profitability.
recommendations: Analyze product performance to adjust stock levels accordingly
business_impact: Improving stock management can reduce holding costs and increase profit margins.

title: [e_commerce] Low Conversion Rate
description: The average conversion rate is only 9%, which is significantly low for an e-commerce platform. This indicates that a large number of users are visiting the site but not completing purchases.
recommendations: Enhance user experience on the website
business_impact: Improving conversion rates can lead to increased sales and revenue.

title: [e_commerce] Inactive Customer Segment
description: There are 13 inactive customers in the dataset, which could indicate a potential loss of revenue if not addressed. The inactive segment makes up a significant portion of the customer base.
recommendations: Engage inactive customers with targeted re-engagement campaigns
Analyze reasons for inactivity and address them
business_impact: Reactivating inactive customers can lead to increased sales and customer loyalty.

title: [e_commerce] High Average Order Value
description: The average total amount per order is 853,682.20, which indicates that customers are spending a significant amount per transaction. However, this could also indicate a limited customer base that can afford such high-value purchases.
recommendations: Diversify product offerings to attract a broader audience
Introduce financing options for higher-priced items
business_impact: Attracting a wider customer base can stabilize revenue and reduce dependency on high-value transactions.

title: [e_commerce] Stock Levels and Product Availability
description: The average stock quantity is 227.34, but some products have very low stock levels. This could lead to stockouts and lost sales opportunities.
recommendations: Monitor stock levels closely and reorder proactively
business_impact: Ensuring product availability can enhance customer satisfaction and increase sales.

title: [e_commerce] Dependence on Online Acquisition Channel
description: The majority of customers (48 out of 200) were acquired through the online channel, indicating a heavy reliance on this channel for customer acquisition.
recommendations: Diversify acquisition channels to include offline and mobile strategies
Invest in partnerships and collaborations for broader reach
business_impact: Reducing reliance on a single acquisition channel can mitigate risks associated with market changes.
